title: Quarkus 2.5.0.Final released - GraalVM/Mandrel 21.3 and usability improvements all over the place
content: Today, we announce the availability of Quarkus 2.5.0.Final which comes with the following main improvements: Upgrade to GraalVM/Mandrel 21.3 Support for JPA entity listeners for Hibernate ORM in native mode Ability to add HTTP headers to responses Various usability improvements in extensions and our dev mode/testing infrastructure Migration Guide To...
